title: Enjoy the Summer With the Nature at the Pormtan Rtiz-Carlton Hotel
text:
Email 
The summer is the perfect time to treat yourself and your loved ones to a luxurious vacation. The Portman Ritz-Carlton, Shanghai launches brand-new summer overnight package — Enjoy the Summer with the Nature. Make your summer truly unforgettable by staying with us. 
Whether you wish to relax in Jing’an Park with a ‘Breakfast to Go’ box or to explore the newly established Shanghai Natural History Museum, stay at The Portman Ritz-Carlton Shanghai to enjoy exceptional comfort and our legendary service. 
Enjoy the Summer with the Nature 
Valid through October 10, 2015 
Starting at CNY 1250 per night 
Reserve your stay with us till October 10 to enjoy our summer privileges 
– 3 complimentary VIP passes to Shanghai Natural History Museum (two adults and one child) per stay or complimentary daily up to two pieces of ‘Breakfast to Go’ boxes 
– Guest staying at Club Room enjoy RMB 300 hotel credit per stay at the gift shop, along with The Ritz-Carlton Elevated Experience 
– Complimentary access to the 24-hour fitness studio and swimming pool 
– Complimentary Internet access 
Room type: Deluxe Room; Shanghai Room; Studio; Club Room For further inquiries or reservations, please contact our reservations hotline at (86 21) 6279 8700, or fax to (86 21) 6279 8772, or email to rc.sharz.reservation@ritzcarlton.com 
Rate is per room/per night, subject to 15% service charge, based on single or double occupancy, exclusive of gratuities, fees and other charges; does not apply to groups; advance reservations are required. Per stay can enjoy up to 3 complimentary passes to Shanghai Natural History Museum (two adults and one child) or complimentary daily up to two pieces of ‘Breakfast to Go’ boxes, the specific number of benefits is according to the actual number of occupancy. Offer is subject to availability. In case of dispute(s), the hotel reserves the right to make the final decision. . Share this:
